name: Lifesaver (sikosis)
description:
Lifesaver ... the game where you swim for your life, saving helpless people in procedurally generated shark infested waters.

Controls

WASD or Gamepad Controller - Swim Movement

Space or A on Gamepad - Swim Boost limited (see stamina bar)

Hints

  • Avoid the bombs.
  • Fish are full of Omega-3 and give you a Double Speed boost for 10 seconds.
  • Yellow Walkie Talkie will teleport you randomly ... you have been warned.
  • Power bars are great for stamina refueling.

Have fun!

Coded by Sikosis - http://games.sikosis.com/
